name: Lemonoid Invasion
description:
Play game here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/552622662/

Instructions:

  • w/up arrow - move up
  • s/down arrow - move down
  • a/left arrow - move left
  • d/right arrow - move right
  • click/space - shoot (in the direction of cursor)
  • joystick - move
  • q - hide joystick
  • m - mute/unmute music
  • click on game over slides

Destroy the lemons and don't die!

When you have died close and reopen the game to play again (I'm working on it)
